abstract: Photographer Alvaro Keding has captured images of New York City subway riders' hands for project Strangers in Common.
lead_paragraph: For a project called “Strangers in Common,” the photographer Alvaro Keding has discreetly captured images of New Yorkers on their commutes.

headline.main: A Photographer Puts Subway Riders’ Idle Hands to Work

snippet: For a project called “Strangers in Common,” the photographer Alvaro Keding has discreetly captured images of New Yorkers on their commutes.
